ARCHIVIST: Statement of Jennifer Ling, regarding a live musical performance she attended in Soho. Original statement given November 3rd, 2013. Audio recording by Jonathan Sims, Head Archivist of the Magnus Institute, London.
It may be nothing, some inconsequential deception or other -- after all, it is ostensibly written to his mother -- but if it was actually to be sent to someone else... I will keep my eye on Martin.
